name: In Memoriam (pen_ultimate)
description:
Before your grandfather's funeral, you return to your grandparents' house one more time.

An interactive narrative game created by Kelly Weng, Zoë Riell, and Claire Robertson for Smith College's Nolen Art Lounge exhibit Significant Play: Exploring the Possibilities of Human Connection and Gameplay (April 21, 2018 - May 3, 2018).
